keepsNodes.title: compose down
keepsNodes.description: Stop and remove the composed containers (make sure you are in the directory containing docker-compose.yml).

keepsNodes.title: compose logs
keepsNodes.description: View logs from the composed services (make sure you are in the directory containing docker-compose.yml)

keepsNodes.title: compose up detached
keepsNodes.description: Build and start the services (make sure you are in the directory containing docker-compose.yml)

keepsNodes.title: execute command
keepsNodes.description: Executes a command inside a running container.

keepsNodes.title: list all containers
keepsNodes.description: Lists all containers (including stopped ones).

keepsNodes.title: list running containers
keepsNodes.description: Lists all running containers.

keepsNodes.title: logs
keepsNodes.description: Displays the logs of a running container.

keepsNodes.title: logs - follow
keepsNodes.description: Displays the logs of a running container.

keepsNodes.title: network - create
keepsNodes.description: Create Docker network.

keepsNodes.title: network - inspect
keepsNodes.description: Inspects a network.

keepsNodes.title: network - list
keepsNodes.description: Lists available networks.

keepsNodes.title: remove
keepsNodes.description: Removes a stopped container.

keepsNodes.title: restart
keepsNodes.description: Stops and then starts a container.

keepsNodes.title: run interactively
keepsNodes.description: Creates and starts a new container from a Docker image in interactive mode while running bash.

keepsNodes.title: run with sleep for infinity
keepsNodes.description: Creates and starts a new container from a Docker image in detached mode for infinity.

keepsNodes.title: start
keepsNodes.description: Starts a stopped container.

keepsNodes.title: stop
keepsNodes.description: Stops a running container.

keepsNodes.title: volume - create
keepsNodes.description: Creates a Docker volume.

keepsNodes.title: volume - inspect
keepsNodes.description: Inspects a volume.

keepsNodes.title: volume - list
keepsNodes.description: Lists all volumes.

keepsNodes.title: volume - remove
keepsNodes.description: Removes a volume.

keepsNodes.title: build image
keepsNodes.description: Builds a Docker image from a Dockerfile (a recipe for creating images).

keepsNodes.title: list local images
keepsNodes.description: Lists all Docker images on your local machine.

keepsNodes.title: pull image
keepsNodes.description: Pulls a Docker image from a registry (e.g., Docker Hub) to your local machine.

keepsNodes.title: remove image
keepsNodes.description: Removes a Docker image from your local machine.

keepsNodes.title: search image on hub
keepsNodes.description: Search for Docker images on the Docker Hub registry.
